partnerDetails.about:
Avantecnia is an independent company that provides high quality automation solutions for the industry. We assemble high level software and hardware components, selected among the most advanced suppliers of industrial automation.
We have a high skilled team of engineers with a broad experience in design and commissioning of industrial control systems. We offer:
  • Total quality commitment with our clients
  • Projects executed according to specifications, on time and within budget
SERVICES:
We offer automation and electrical engineering, consulting and training services on industrial control systems.
Automation engineering
  • Basic engineering
  • PLC, DCS & SCADA programming
  • Expert systems for cement factories
  • Installation and commissioning
  • Application maintenance
Electrical engineering
  • Low and medium voltage calculation and design
  • Electrical cabinet design
  • Technical direction
Consulting
  • Control project specifications
  • Low and medium voltage specifications
  • Proposals evaluation
Training and courses
  • PLC & SCADA programming courses
  • Tailored courses on applications
SOLUTIONS:
We develop high quality control applications to increase the efficiency of the production processes.
  • avanProc: Supervision and control system for the cement and minerals industry
  • avanLab: Laboratory automation software
  • avanXpert: Expert system for optimization of complex processes
  • avanInfo: Process information and reporting system
